[00:07.85]I've been reading books of old
[00:10.18]The legends and the myths
[00:12.43]Achilles and his gold
[00:14.75]Hercules and his gifts
[00:17.11]Spiderman's control
[00:19.31]And Batman with his fists
[00:22.07]And clearly I don't see myself upon that list
[00:26.28]
[00:26.49]But she said, where'd you wanna go?
[00:28.84]How much you wanna risk?
[00:30.96]I'm not looking for somebody
[00:32.96]With some superhuman gifts
[00:35.73]Some superhero
[00:37.70]Some fairytale bliss
[00:40.36]Just something I can turn to
[00:42.52]Somebody I can kiss
[00:44.34]
[00:44.69]I want something just like this
